scenarios.title: The Great Shift
scenarios.description: In a world where an ancient celestial event awakened a powerful cosmic force, humanity experienced a series of unprecedented and interconnected changes.
scenarios.origin: On the eve of the 21st century, a rare alignment of celestial bodies unleashed a cosmic disturbance known as the 'Great Shift.' This event was heralded by a series of inexplicable phenomena, including auroras visible at equatorial regions and unexplained gravitational anomalies.

timeline.event: Celestial bodies align, triggering the Great Shift.
Global legal framework instantly adjusts to accommodate new realities, dissolving all existing marriages and partnerships.
Advanced AI systems experience a glitch, causing widespread communication outages and technological malfunctions.
Global health directives mandate new health protocols, emphasizing mental well-being and environmental health.
New regulatory laws are introduced, dictating the integration of magical and scientific education in schools.

scenarios.coherence_note: The Great Shift brought about a cascade of changes, starting with the alignment of celestial bodies and ending with new legal and health directives. These changes are interconnected, affecting social structures, legal frameworks, technological systems, work environments, and public health, all stemming from a single cosmic event.

timeline.event: Massive atmospheric anomaly begins, affecting global weather patterns and causing unusual biological changes.

scenarios.coherence_note: The mysterious atmospheric anomaly caused a ripple effect, affecting everything from genetic mutations and health to cultural norms and educational approaches. Each change was directly linked to the initial anomaly, creating a cohesive narrative of global transformation.
